summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MatheVilla math learning platform. Backend APIs fully functional, admin login and task management working. Student registration has dropdown interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: shadcn Select dropdown for grade selection not clickable via automation - options visible but not selectable
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents automated testing of student registration flow, but manual testing shows dropdown works

passed_tests: API Health Check - GET /api/ returns success
Student registration API - backend accepts registration data
Admin login flow - successful authentication and redirect
Admin dashboard - all stats cards and elements present
Admin task management - navigation and task table display
Backend API endpoints - all 14 API tests passed
Login page loads with proper form elements
Admin dashboard shows correct statistics (1 student, 77 tasks, 100% success rate)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix shadcn Select component interaction for grade selection in registration form. Consider using native HTML select or ensure proper data-testid attributes on dropdown options for better testability.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Most flows working, dropdown interaction issue in registration
